text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ADVERT>
  <ITEM>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben:
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Pa√üions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>fl. 2.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>24. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Stahiii</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
      <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
      <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>32. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistl.</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Krancken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>48. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Hau√ü-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
      <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
      <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>40. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
  </ITEM>
</ADVERT>","number_of_corrections":9,"explanation":"1) Added a single root element <ADVERT> to ensure the document is well-formed XML.
2) Repaired the mismatched <PRICE> opening tag to <PRIZE> so that start/end tags match.
3) Escaped the two bare ampersands inside TITLE elements to &.
4) Removed five stray "√†" bullet characters that were sitting between elements and broke the text flow.
5) Reformatted indentation/line-breaks for readability (does not count as a correction)."}

<ADVERT>
  <ITEM>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben:
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Pa√üions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>fl. 2.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>24. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Stahiii</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
      <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
      <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>32. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistl.</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Krancken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>48. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Hau√ü-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
      <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
      <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>40. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
  </ITEM>
</ADVERT>
parsed.explanation:
1) Added a single root element <ADVERT> to ensure the document is well-formed XML.
2) Repaired the mismatched <PRICE> opening tag to <PRIZE> so that start/end tags match.
3) Escaped the two bare ampersands inside TITLE elements to &.
4) Removed five stray "√†" bullet characters that were sitting between elements and broke the text flow.
5) Reformatted indentation/line-breaks for readability (does not count as a correction).
